changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, base_table.id, s.name AS service, pc.name AS parent_code, cc.name AS child_code, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.version FROM status_code_sequencing base_table JOIN product s ON base_table.service = s.id JOIN status_code pc ON base_table.parent_code = pc.id JOIN status_code cc ON base_table.child_code = cc.id JOIN agency up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON base_table.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
